title: How the Supreme Court UAPA verdict leaves loopholes for agencies to exploit
selftext: With the ruling, now there is no requirement for the State to prove that a person, being a member of an unlawful organisation, has actually resorted to violence.
comments:
Why do we keep wearing this mask of democracy? 

Can we please go ahead and declare that we are an autocracy already?
